The NYC General Assembly is composed of dozens of groups working together to organize and set the vision for the #occupywallstreet movement. This is our official website.

    Who is working on ”Search” and when will it be back? We shouldn’t be planning extensive updates past tomorrow (Thursday) morning. We should spend as much time as we can tomorrow using the site and getting content populated.
